info.title: PhotonIQ Prerender Service
info.description: API documentation for the PhotonIQ Prerender service

post.description: This endpoint clears rendered pages from the origin cache. It is possible to clear all records related to the origin or specific records according to the "urls" list.

urls.description: List of origin paths to be deleted from the cache

get.description: This endpoint returns the service health status.

parameters.name: x-photoniq-customerid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the customer

get.description: This endpoint returns all synthetic interactions associated with the origin.

created.description: Date when the interaction was created

lastUpdated.description: Date when the interaction was updated

isActive.description: Whether the interaction is active or not

valueInPx.description: How many pixels to scroll in each step

steps.description: How many steps to finalize scrolling

delayBetween.description: The delay between each scroll step

isActive.description: Whether the specific interaction is active or not

urlPaths.description: Origin paths where the specific interaction is executed or not, depending on the "operation" attribute.

operation.description: The operator applied against the "urlPaths" list

get.summary: Get Metrics from the prerender service

parameters.name: x-photoniq-customerid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the customer

get.description: This endpoint returns all origins from the origin-related GDN fabric.

identifyNotfound.description: Content that identifies not found pages (404) in rendered pages

passThroughHeaders.description: List of header keys that are forwarded from the bot request to the origin website

basedOnStatusCode.description: Whether the header value should be based on the response status code

oneOf.description: Status code. Ranges like 2xx can be also used.

addResponseHeaders.description: Map of headers to be added to the response

caching.description: Whether or not to cache rendered pages

ttl.description: Cache lifetime of rendered pages (in seconds)

created.description: Date when the origin was created

lastUpdated.description: Date when the origin was updated

post.description: This endpoint creates an origin in the origin-related GDN fabric.

addResponseHeaders.description: Map of headers to be added to the response

ttl.description: Cache lifetime of rendered pages (in seconds)

get.description: This endpoint returns the prefetch configuration associated with the origin.

isRenderForMobile.description: Whether to render for mobile devices or not

createdAt.description: Date when the prefetch configuration was created

updatedAt.description: Date when the prefetch configuration was updated

post.description: This endpoint creates a prefetch configuration associated with the origin.

isRenderForMobile.description: Whether to render for mobile devices or not

patch.description: This endpoint updates the prefetch configuration associated with the origin.

isRenderForMobile.description: Whether to render for mobile devices or not

delete.description: This endpoint deletes the prefetch configuration associated with the origin.

get.description: This endpoint returns the latest prefetch statistics associated with the origin.

post.description: This endpoint creates a prefetch trigger associated with the origin.

get.description: This endpoint returns the latest prefetch URLs associated with the origin.

isMobile.description: Whether the URL is rendered for mobile devices or not

createdAt.description: Date when the prefetch URL was created

updatedAt.description: Date when the prefetch URL was updated

get.description: This endpoint returns the HTML content of the rendered page.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Whether to render as a mobile device or not

200.description: Successfully fetched the prerendered page content

schema.description: Successfully fetched the prerendered page content

get.description: This endpoint returns the HTML content of the rendered page.

parameters.name: mobile
parameters.description: Whether to render as a mobile device or not

parameters.name: x-photoniq-prerender-mobile
parameters.description: Whether to render as a mobile device or not

200.description: Successfully fetched the prerendered page content

schema.description: Successfully fetched the prerendered page content

get.description: This endpoint returns the prerender settings associated with the origin.

injectInlineCSS.description: Whether or not to inject CSS into the HTML

addRequestHeader.description: Whether or not to add X-PhotonIQ-Prerender-Request header to each request made during page rendering

blockRequestTypes.description: List of resource types that should be blocked (e.g., fonts, stylesheets)

urlBlockList.description: List of URLs that should be blocked (e.g., https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net/pagead)

created.description: Date when the settings was created

lastUpdated.description: Date when the settings was updated

patch.description: This endpoint updates the prerender settings associated with the origin.

injectInlineCSS.description: Whether or not to inject CSS into the HTML

addRequestHeader.description: Whether or not to add X-PhotonIQ-Prerender-Request header to each request made during page rendering

blockRequestTypes.description: List of resource types that should be blocked (e.g., fonts, stylesheets)

urlBlockList.description: List of URLs that should be blocked (e.g., https://googleads.g.doubleclick.net/pagead)

parameters.name: sortOrder
parameters.description: Order of sort: ASC or DESC

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Field by which results should be sorted

parameters.name: x-photoniq-customerid
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the customer

get.description: This endpoint returns the API version.
